text:
Fixers (YCS18) | Senior Full stack developer | London | Onsite | Fulltime

Fixers is founded by smart and passionate seasoned entrepreneurs that have worked together for 12 years and built and sold businesses in travel, events and music. We're looking for somebody to join our extremely talented founding team that shares our drive and hunger, work hard play hard attitude and enormous vision for Fixers to become the 'everything store for travel'.

We're looking for a Senior Full Stack Rails Developer based in London to join our founding team and work directly with our CEO and product/engineering team to take our platform technology to new heights. This is the ideal role for somebody looking for a senior engineering role within an extremely fast-paced and rapidly growing startup.

Apply here: https://fixersworld.com/careers/senior-developer Any questions: kyle@fixers.co.uk
